page.title: 15INTERESTING PEOPLE 1
page.content: MISS KEEN In 1933 Miss Keen came to Brampton to live with her parents. Miss Keen had a job in Hereford so she could not be with her parents most of the time. She managed to see her parents on the weekend. She had this job for several years. Just after the war she was told that she was a member of the British Empire.In 1953 her Mother died so she had to look after her father.When the Queen was crowned there was a party in Brampton she went to the party but did not stay that long.There was games,food and other things.Just after the party her Father died.In 1956 the Village Hall was built Miss Keen was there when Dr.Green opened it.Miss Keen gave us alot of information. { By Daniel Cooke and { Nicky Price
